entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets beginning near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Ice pellets or snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain after midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
